article_title: New Mental Health Mandate Will Make Obamacare More Expensive, Increase Fraud And Canceled Policies

article_metadata.description: The Obama administration just enacted new regulations requiring health insurers to cover mental health care needs to the same extent they cover physical health care, opening the door more fraud, higher premiums and canceled insurance policies.
article_metadata.author: Merrill Matthews

og.description: The Obama administration just enacted new regulations requiring health insurers to cover mental health care needs to the same extent they cover physical health care, opening the door more fraud, higher premiums and canceled insurance policies.
